name: Discspin Misfortune Redux
description:
DMR is a fast game in which you have to avoid incoming obstacles and collect different powerups. Get annoyed by some nasty powerups! Watch your player crash into walls and try not to break anything in your surroundings! Beat your best score and survive as long as you can!

Controls

Left/Right Arrow - move player

Space - accept

Known issues

If you have some issues with displayed text try to restart the game or refreshing the page

Mozilla Firefox may not be a good choice for the game, because it may become laggy. Also, you will have to turn off Private Browsing to play the game (it's an issue of the browser itself). Use other browser or download the game if you don't want it to be laggy.
